reviews.review: Not worth a dime. this game is currently about 80% killer sided. the killers complain that the survivors have a lack of shill while at the same time being able to hit you behind their back and from 15 feet away. they have very over powered perks while most of the survivor ones are basically useless in the long run. As long as they keep nerfing the survivors this game is going to die its already on it's last leg with about a 9 minute queue between lobbies. but the dev's are to killer sided and busy to play their own game to care because people will just keep buying the new broken killers.

All they do is fix the game for people who bitch about the simple things rather then add a new game mode, its fun for like 100 hours then its so fucking repetitive that you just wanna blow your brains out. They have taken away the little things that killers and survivors could have, im done gg bois dont buy

Un juego excepcional en el ámbito del terror. Infinidad de convinaciones de perks, infinitas maneras de usar los personajes,etc. Cosas como estas anteriores hacen a este juego único y muy superior a otros en su mismo rubro, en lo personal me encanta y disfruto mucho jugandolo ya sea solo como killer/survivor o con amigos como survivors intentando escapar. Lo único malo y que podrían mejorar es imponer algun tipo de sanciones en puntos de sangre (10% menos de ganancias en la partida o cosas así) para aquellos killers que campean descaradamente o tunelean para asegurar kills, ya que estos dos tipos de killers le quitan la diversión a las partidas.
Jogo muito bom, porem ter que ter um pouco de calma galera meio toxica, como em qualquer outro jogo infelizmente. Fora isso jogo muito bom e valor justo.

Jogo perfeito. Tem ótimos personagens (tanto os assassinos, quanto os sobreviventes), e tem uma trilha sonora e uma ambientação incrível. Você se sente num filme de terror com aquela trilha sonora de terror quando tem um assassino correndo atrás de você, é impossível não ficar tenso nas partidas.

Killer too powerful, killer can win a 1v1 vs a survivor too easily

So, this game is fun but not without major problems in the current patch.

The basic premise of gameplay is that 4 survivors all try to repair a set of 6 generators(they only need to repair 5) and a single killer must attempt to kill them all before that happens.

A simple premise but gameplay for killers ends up being neutered since the developers refuse to make a lot of the weaker killers stronger and refuse to make the stronger killers feel more fair to fight against while still nerfing all killers.

Survivor gameplay is almost always in one of three states:

-Running from the killer because they are right next to you
-Hiding from the killer because stealth is really powerful
-Holding your mouse down and pressing spacebar for a timing minigame to repair generators every 30 seconds or so

So a good portion of the game's depth and complexity for killer's side is neutered by the fact that survivors are almost constantly more powerful but survivor's depth and complexity of gameplay comes mostly from knowledge of where you are and good decision making with your other teammates.

I can't say I'd reccomend the game to anyone who wants to have fun right away after buying the game. See after buying the base game, you have to grind two sets of in-game currency to unlock characters and abilities. 

You grind for Bloodpoints and for iridescent shards. The first currency is for unlocking things such as items for survivors(flashlights, med kits, toolboxes, maps, and keys) or for unlocking additional parts of killer's powers which are consumed upon use(Bear trap guy can carry 2 more bear traps or Hillbilly can charge up his chainsaw faster. Stuff like that).

Overall I can't stress how much I wouldn't get the game in it's current state(unless this game is on sale for like 5$, then go ahead). If you're a surivor you won't have fun because it's way too easy to survive on your own or with friends and if you want to play killer it won't be fun because it's too hard most of the time and survivors have way too much power most of the time lol.

Ingredientes:
3 xícaras de chá de farinha de trigo (Sem fermento)
2 xícaras de chá de açúcar
3 ovos
200 ml de leite
4 colheres sopa de manteiga
1 colher de sopa de fermento químico em pó

Modo de Preparo:
1Numa tigela, junte os ovos, o açúcar e a manteiga.
2Misture tudo muito bem e adicione o leite.
3Continue misturando e depois adicione toda a farinha de trigo.
4Misture até que a massa fique bem homogênea.
5Por ultimo, adicione o fermento e misture delicadamente até que agregue completamente na massa.
6Despeje a massa do bolo simples caseiro numa forma untada e enfarinhada.
7Leve para assar em forno preaquecido, 180ºC, por cerca de 40 minutinhos ou até dourar.

This game genuinely feels like it is held together by tape. Constant crashing, invisible hitboxes, repeated error messages on startup, and one of the most toxic playerbases to boot. The gameplay itself is enjoyable with a  group, but unfortunately the bugs and glitches cause the experience to be frustrating after a few matches. As for the community, I believe it to be the single most hate-filled and salty playerbasee out of  a variety of games available. Avoid at all cost

I changed my mind about this game. I try my best to play for the good moments but I always find that the bad moments outweigh the good. For starters, hit boxes; I can be hit from a mile away and have even been downed after the killer's swing was complete. Another thing is the report system; I go against endless killers who always go after me even after getting unhooked. I even go against killers who go as far as to sit near the hook just to make sure they're close enough to hit me if I'm ever unhooked. This leads me to my final complaint which is the ranking system; where do I even begin with this. The problem with the ranking system is they have these specific color tiers (grey, green, purple, red), but you aren't actually guaranteed to match up with players your rank. This means that a killer at rank 1 can be matched up with a group of survivors at rank 20. That's like the match up of Bo Jackson versus 4 middle-aged, out of shape white men. Another thing about the rank system is how people who are primarily targeted by the killer still somehow lose a pip despite not having a chance to do anything. If I'm being targeted by an angry killer, they'll just stay on me! I won't get points for escaping or for being in a chase, and I won't get points for anything else from doing generators or healing other people because I won't have the opportunity to! And I certainly couldn't make it to a window or a pallet either because the hit boxes are still broken after years of development! I honestly did not wish to type this here, but rather do an actually developer of the game; I couldn't find anywhere to chat or even place a review directly to them. I honestly wish that they can just listen for once and put a little bit more care into this game; they should please put as much care into the game mechanics as they do with new killers/survivors. I truly have had incredibly fun experiences on this game, and I can't explain how fun it can be to unlock a new perk and create builds with them. It's just unbearable having to deal with this stuff on a day to day basis.
This game is amazing, easy to learn and hard to master! Good to play alone and great with friends.
Vellah Geriyor Ama Arkadaşınla Oynuyosan Zevkli

Polecam jeżeli nie męczy cię dostawanie paletą w mordę i teabagging prawie w każdym meczu, a i dodatkowo gra ma dużo problemów, których twórcom nie chce się rozwiązywać, bo zamiast tego wolą wydawać nowe dlc i wspierać system NFT, więc no, twórcy nie podejmują żadnych sensownych decyzji, ale gra ma unikalny koncept, którego jeszcze żadnej konkurencyjnej grze nie udało się się zrealizować na taką skalę i z takim sukcesem komercyjnym. Ogólnie to mam co do tej gry mieszane uczucia ale są one raczej lekko po tej pozytywnej stronie, gdybym miał ocenić ją w skali 1-10 to dałbym takie 6/10.

Buen juego para pasar el rato con amigos y tener sustitos de vez en cuando
Contras: 
-A veces encontrarás jugadores que juegan para ganar puntos y no para colaborar.
-A veces encontrarás asesinos que campean a un jugador que colgó, haciendo imposible la partida para dicho jugador.
-Largos tiempos de espera para encontrar servidores si juegas en grupo (4 a 8 minutos)

Pros (algunos, no podría nombrarlos todos):
-Puedes jugarlo en un microondas.
-Bajo precio (mucho más si te lo pillas en ofertas, que aparecen frecuentemente)
-Puedes comprar personajes con dinero del juego sin tener que sacar de tu bolsillo real.

puntos extra:
-Los desarrolladores están constantemente lanzando contenido nuevo.

В принципе игра мне понравилась. Но новым игрокам придётся туго. Убийца за частую рангом выше и имеет разные перки от других убийц. Так что через кровь, слёзы и пот можно прокачаться и быть более-менее на равне с ним. Система прокачки долгая и нудная, чтобы быть отличным выжившим, необходимо прокачать несколько персонажей до 45 уровня минимум. Далее собираешь крутой билд и берешь на себя одну из ролей в команде. Надеюсь разработчики наконец начнут прислушиваться не только к той аудитории, что уже прокачала всё, что можно, но и к новым игрокам.
